name: Valdrada's Mirror
description:
Valdrada's mirror is a stealth game where you need to get the character to the top of the building by avoiding guards and collecting keys to unlock doors. 

Players can use the mirrors on each level to avoid guards easier and enter other rooms. 

Movement:  Move: W, A , S , D | Jump: Space | Stop: Shift

DATT3300 Submission

Document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WPWyL0-3W8P0XUi_TOqZn7NnbfjUi0cAsHazZCPDCMc/...
